amendment.description: Amendment sought to restore Selective Service Agency funding of $24.2 million and strike language that terminates the agency.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in H. Rept. 106-292 to restore Selective Service Agency funding of $24.2 million and strike language that terminates the agency.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cunningham amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 232 (Roll no. 391).
